note: He/Him #Abolition #NoBorders #FreePalestine #BijiRojava Anti-imperialism=/=Inverse American Exceptionalism Header picture is a side profile photo of anarchist feminist Voltairine de Cleyre, with a quote that reads “I die, as I have lived, an Anarchist, owing no allegiance to rulers heavenly or earthly.” Profile picture is of Shaggy from Scooby-Doo squinting as he holds a cigarette with his mouth slightly agape. The photo has a distinct purple haze.

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: Anarchist communist, libertarian communist, believer in libertarian socialism unity
